Articles.Content:
So as some of you should know, i'm working on a KSP 3d animate series,

I worked on a lip sync script and... Well, i better just show you....

what... what have i done?
Seems to me that you like sneezed? while in the edit mesh mode. sneezed = I have no idea what you did!
Yeah, that seems to be what happened.
Probably something a bit off with your rigging.
Looks like someone peeked into the Ark of the Covenant.

"When Kerbals loose an arm or leg,Pieces of skin in the face start to break off and remplace the lost limb"

Maybe that happened?

Its called Troglodyte Regenerative Syndrome

All Kerbals have it.
